privacyPolicy.title: Politique de confidentialit√©
privacyPolicy.intro: Barakah Furqan respects your privacy. This policy explains what data and permissions are used to provide app features.
privacyPolicy.section1Body:
We do not require account registration and do not ask for personal identifiers such as name or phone number. However, the app may process:

‚Ä¢ Location (approximate/precise): for Qibla direction and prayer times.
‚Ä¢ Microphone: for recitation (tilawah) practice.
‚Ä¢ Internet connection: to fetch Quran data and prayer schedules.
‚Ä¢ Technical usage data (e.g., error logs/performance) if available from the system/SDK to improve stability.
privacyPolicy.section2Body:
‚Ä¢ ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION / ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION: calculate Qibla direction and prayer times.
‚Ä¢ RECORD_AUDIO: recitation (tilawah) practice.
‚Ä¢ INTERNET: fetch Quran data, tafsir/translations, and prayer schedules.
privacyPolicy.section3Body:
We use data to:

‚Ä¢ Run core features on your device.
‚Ä¢ Improve reliability, quality, and support.
‚Ä¢ Diagnose and fix technical issues.
privacyPolicy.section4Body:
‚Ä¢ Some data (e.g., language preference, cached schedules) is stored locally on your device.
‚Ä¢ We do not store your data on Barakah Furqan servers unless explicitly stated in the future.
‚Ä¢ You can clear local data by clearing app data or uninstalling the app.
privacyPolicy.section5Body:
‚Ä¢ We do not sell your data.
‚Ä¢ Some features use third‚Äëparty services (e.g., prayer time providers or speech recognition) that process data according to their own policies.
‚Ä¢ We aim to use trusted services relevant to app functionality.
privacyPolicy.section6Body: We take reasonable measures to protect your data. However, no system is 100% secure.
privacyPolicy.section7Body: The app is intended for general audiences and does not knowingly collect personal data from children.
privacyPolicy.section8Body:
You may:

‚Ä¢ Deny permissions (location/microphone), but some features may not work.
‚Ä¢ Remove local data by clearing app data or uninstalling the app.
privacyPolicy.section9Body: We may update this policy. Significant changes will be communicated via app updates or release notes.
privacyPolicy.section10Body:
If you have questions about this policy, contact:

Email: dgirsandi@gmail.com
